pages.title: Expandable Crate
pages.text: Perfect if you just want to toss your items in a big box, Expandable Crates can be stacked up to a a 2x2 multi-block storage.

pages.title: Slotted Chest
pages.text: If you like to keep things very organized, the slotted chest is a 1-block solution that has the capacity of a double-chest, but requires you to sort your items so they are all in the right place and stay in the right place. Not for hoarders!

pages.title: Ender Storage
pages.text: Color-coded, linked inventories. Instant item transportation and organized storage. And you can lock the chest with a diamond!

pages.title: Dank Storage
pages.text: Late-game, upgradable multi-use storage. Stack items well above 64. The ultimate container.
